summary: Email chain between legal professionals regarding discovery production to Ghislaine Maxwell, including discussion of photographs produced in a civil case and their chain of custody. References FBI involvement in taking original photos into custody and provides details about evidence handling in 2011.

persons.name: Sigrid McCawley
persons.role: Partner at Boies Schiller Flexner LLP
persons.context: Attorney involved in discovery process, providing information about photographs produced in a civil case and their chain of custody, including FBI involvement.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Recipient of discovery materials being prepared by legal staff; central figure in the criminal case.

connections.description: McCawley is involved in the discovery process, preparing materials to be produced to Maxwell as part of legal proceedings.

events.title: Discovery preparation for Maxwell
events.description: Legal staff preparing discovery materials including photographs to be loaded onto a drive for Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: FBI evidence collection
events.description: FBI Special Agent traveled to a residence to collect evidence including 20 ITM massage school certification, photographs, and other items which were placed in case file envelopes.

keyFacts: Photographs were produced as part of a civil case and are being included in discovery materials for Ghislaine Maxwell.
The original photographs were taken into custody by the FBI, with only electronic copies or CDs remaining with the law firm.
On March 18, 2011, an FBI Special Agent collected evidence including massage school certification and photographs that were placed in case file envelopes.
The email chain shows coordination between legal professionals regarding the proper handling and production of discovery materials.
References to bates numbers and chain of custody documentation for photographic evidence.
